column5: Hey Guys,  It's unfortunate that I have not been around for a while and haven't been out fishing since about August or September. Since December I've been in training with the York Regional Police, and now, I'm off to the Ontario Police College on Sunday night for the next 3 months.  A lot of things will be tested while I'm there, Including 3 months apart from my beautiful expecting wife. It'll tough, but I know it'll be worth it in the end.  I'll check the board when I can, but for those who are fishin on the ice, take care, play safe and for goodness sake don't do anything stupid....stupidity kills more people than alcohol!  Take Care   Dave
Best of luck!!!  Thanks for being willing to serve!  dk

Thanks for the update and hang in there!  I'm not sure if I could be away from home for that long....will you be home for the birth of you child?  Congrats on your succession thru training!  Hope you get back to fishing in the spring.
Hope all goes well for you. We need another good officer in York.
Good luck!!!    Ya but if ya wanna have a GOOD time put stupidity AND alchohol together!!!!
" Ya but if ya wanna have a GOOD time put stupidity AND alchohol together!!!! "  And then the cops show up, lol.....
Good luck Dave, and you can go home on weekends, or you could a few years ago when a co-workers wife went there.  Maureen
Good Luck Dave and the time away will all be worth it in the long run.
Good luck Dave! My brother hasn't been home in about 28 years.... for more than a few days at a time ....and he's still happily married! LOL
